data.name: HeroSubtitle
data.value: The place for the best stories, where you can read, share, and discover countless works from talented authors worldwide.

data.name: WhyChooseUs
data.value: Unique features for the best reading experience

data.name: ReadAnywhere
data.value: Optimized interface for all devices, allowing you to read comfortably on phone, tablet, or computer.

data.name: ActiveCommunity
data.value: Connect with thousands of readers and authors, share emotions, comment, and discuss your favorite stories.

data.name: SmartSuggestions
data.value: Smart AI system suggests stories that match your interests, helping you discover new works.

data.name: FreeWriting
data.value: Powerful writing tools with a modern editor, making it easy to create and share your works.

data.name: PersonalManagement
data.value: Store and manage your favorite stories, track reading progress, and never miss a new chapter.

data.name: Security
data.value: Advanced security system, absolutely protecting your personal information and works.

data.name: ReadyToStart
data.value: Join our community today and discover the endless world of stories
